Works great for now, though I can't notice any visual difference between the trial and the cracked version. I guess I'll know for sure after 30 days, LOL...

One small side note: Version XI has problems open/converting local HTML files with file paths containing hash signs (#), something that version X had no problems dealing with. Changing the file path solves the issue, though.
